product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies 30 Day Flashlight - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Have you ever accidently left your flashlight on overnight only to find the batteries are completely dead the next morning? Not with this flashlight, it will keep shining up to 30 days straight!
short_description: Have you ever accidently left your flashlight on overnight only to find the batteries are completely dead the next morning? Not with this flashlight, it will keep shining up to 30 days straight!
